fairy_sparklers.name: Fairy Sparklers
fairy_sparklers.description: Multi-colored sparklers that are safe for any age.

fire_crackers.name: Fire Crackers
fire_crackers.description: Small fireworks which make a loud pop. Safe for ages 10 and up.

snakes.name: Snakes
snakes.description: Small black tube which grows up to 10x it's size! Safe for all ages.

the_big_one.name: The Big One
the_big_one.description: A large Multi-colored flower. For professional use only.

the_ninja.name: The Ninja
the_ninja.description: Completely silent until it reaches it's peak and turns into a large shuriken. For professional use only.

the_smiley_face.name: The Smiley Face
the_smiley_face.description: A large, yellow, round smiley face. For professional use only.

the_heart.name: The Heart
the_heart.description: A large red heart for Valentine's Day. For personal or professional use.

the_flag.name: The Flag
the_flag.description: A flag of the United States. Perfect for 4th of July. Professional use only.

the_turkey.name: The Turkey
the_turkey.description: A large uncooked turkey to celebrate Thanksiving. Professional use only.

rdx.name: RDX
rdx.description: High-powered explosive designed to take out steel columns to produce implosion demolition.

dynamite.name: Dynamite
dynamite.description: High-powered explosive designed for concrete column implosion demolition.

atomic_bomb.name: Atomic Bomb
atomic_bomb.description: When your neighbors should no longer exist. Recommended only as a last resort.

hand_grenade.name: Hand Grenade
hand_grenade.description: Caution: pin pulling will trigger explosion.

tnt.name: TNT
tnt.description: For when you really want to get that roadrunner.

nitroglycerin.name: Nitroglycerin
nitroglycerin.description: Not the kind you find in your grandma's medicine cabinet.
